title: Gears of War 2
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Chinese. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Winter approaches. War rages on.  Entire cities are sinking, swallowed by a new threat from below. Soon humanity will have nothing left to defend. Only one option remains: an all-out attack on the Locust Horde.  • HD Gaming’s New Standard Innovative controls and unmatched intensity made Gears of War® one of the best-selling Xbox 360® games ever. Breakthrough advances in Unreal® Engine 3 raise the bar again.  • A Blockbuster Experience Use enemies as shields, fight chainsaw duels, and discover new monsters, weapons, and vehicles in an emotional campaign of loss and retribution.  • Explosive Xbox LIVE® Play The most visceral online shooter gets even better with a new party system, more co-op modes, and TrueSkill(TM) matchmaking. (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: A Conversation with Gears Author Karen Traviss (HD)
childDownloads.description: New York Times best-selling author Karen Traviss completed her second Gears of War novel, Jacinto's Remnant, coming off the success of her earlier Aspho Fields. During a visit to Epic, she talked about her love for the Gears universe and provided insights into the two books.

childDownloads.title: Campaign Gameplay Reveal
childDownloads.description: Get your first glimpse into Gears of War 2’s stunning campaign in this clip with introduction by lead designer Cliff Bleszinski. Released May 9, 2008.

childDownloads.title: COG Armor
childDownloads.description: This sturdy design has endured longer than most COG soldiers who have worn it into battle.  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: “COGs of War” Picture Pack
childDownloads.description: This set includes the key Gears; Marcus Fenix, Dom Santiago, Damon Baird, Augustus Cole, and new faces from Gears of War 2.

childDownloads.title: Combustible Map Pack Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Cole Train introduces the three new battlefields of the Combustible Map Pack; Flood, Gold Rush, and Fuel Station.

childDownloads.title: Combustible Multiplayer Map Pack
childDownloads.description: Explosive action takes center stage in these three new Gears 2 multiplayer maps: Flood, Gold Rush, and Fuel Station. Flood features a rising flow of Imulsion that drives the fight into close quarters. Infiltrate an Imulsion factory in Gold Rush, where multiple levels and volatile materials guarantee memorable encounters. Fuel Station delivers a dangerous battle around an abandoned refueling facility. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Dark Corners Gameplay Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: This trailer offers a glimpse into the new Dark Corners campaign experience and each of the seven new multiplayer maps.

childDownloads.title: Dark Corners Multiplayer Map Pack
childDownloads.description: This downloadable content pack features 7 new Gears 2 multiplayer maps and a bonus deleted single-player chapter, "Road to Ruin," from the Gears of War 2 campaign. In "Road to Ruin," Marcus and Dom navigate the treacherous Locust highway, choosing stealth or blazing action to survive. For multiplayer fans, the 7 maps include a new War Machine, the much-requested Gears 1 map; Allfathers Garden, a heavy-weapons battle at a COG landmark; Highway, a fight deep in the Locust Hollow; Memorial, a battle at the Tomb of the Unknowns; Nowhere, a firefight in an old motel; Way Station, an unpredictable battlefield with parallel paths; and Sanctuary, a reimagined favorite from Gears for Windows. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: E3 2008: Gears of War 2 Demo Presentation
childDownloads.description: Cliff Bleszinski unveils a new campaign chapter, “Sinkhole,” during Microsoft’s press briefing in Los Angeles, CA. Released July 16, 2008

childDownloads.title: Flashback Multiplayer Map Pack
childDownloads.description: As a special thanks to the fans, we’ve updated five popular maps from Gears of War—Gridlock, Subway, Canals, Mansion, and Tyro Station—and made them available to download. This map pack is also available for free with an Xbox LIVE redemption code included in new copies of Gears of War 2. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Gears 2 - Bare Your Teeth (Premium)
childDownloads.description: This theme’s red and black imagery was first seen during the Gears of War 2 announcement at the 2008 Game Developers Conference. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Gears 2 - Destroyed Beauty (Premium)
childDownloads.description: The crumbled buildings and ruined monuments of Sera are somber reminders of life before Emergence Day. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Gears 2 Dark Corners at Comic-Con 2009
childDownloads.description: Epic Games previews the new Dark Corners game add-on from the show floor at Comic-Con International 2009.
